  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adobe.cq.commerce.common.collection.AbstractProductCollection

    @ConsumerType
public abstract class AbstractProductCollection
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProductCollection
    An abstract implementation of a ProductCollection

      • getProperty

        public <T> T getProperty(java.lang.String key,
                         T defaultValue)
        Description copied from interface: ProductCollection
        Returns a named collection property or a default value if the property can not be retrieved.
        Specified by:
        getProperty in interface ProductCollection
        Parameters:
        key - The name of the property
        defaultValue - The default value to use if the named property does not exist or cannot be converted to the requested type. The default value is also used to define the type to convert the value to. If this is null any existing property is not converted.
        Returns:
        The named value converted to type T or the default value if non existing or can't be converted.

      • getDirectReferences

        public java.util.Iterator<java.lang.String> getDirectReferences()
        Description copied from interface: ProductCollection
        Returns an iterator over product or collection paths/IDs directly referenced in the collection. These are the first level descendants of the collection as opposed to all levels descendant products returned by ProductCollection.getProducts()
        Specified by:
        getDirectReferences in interface ProductCollection
        Returns:
        iterator over product or collection paths/IDs directly referred in collection.

      • hasDirectReference

        public boolean hasDirectReference(java.lang.String path)
        Description copied from interface: ProductCollection
        Returns true if the product or the collection referenced by the path/ID is directly referenced in the collection. To check if a product is part of all levels descendants of the collection, use ProductCollection.contains(com.adobe.cq.commerce.api.Product).
        Specified by:
        hasDirectReference in interface ProductCollection
        Parameters:
        path - product or collection path to be added, if the product/collection is represented in the repository. Otherwise, it is an ID uniquely identifying the product/collection to the external commerce engine.
        Returns:
        true if product or collection path is part of the collection. false otherwise

      • add

        public void add(java.lang.String path)
         throws CommerceException
        Description copied from interface: ProductCollection
        Creates a new entry (product or collection) in the collection at the last position
        Specified by:
        add in interface ProductCollection
        Parameters:
        path - product or collection path to be added, if the product/collection is represented in the repository. Otherwise, it is an ID uniquely identifying the product/collection to the external commerce engine.
        Throws:
        CommerceException - if the operation fails, if collection already contained the product/collection or product/collection is null.

      • remove

        public void remove(java.lang.String path)
            throws CommerceException
        Description copied from interface: ProductCollection
        Removes an entry of product or collection from collection.
        Specified by:
        remove in interface ProductCollection
        Parameters:
        path - product or collection path to be added, if the product/collection is represented in the repository. Otherwise, it is an ID uniquely identifying the product/collection to the external commerce engine.
        Throws:
        CommerceException - if the operation fails, or if product/collection reference was not removed / not present

      • orderBefore

        public void orderBefore(java.lang.String srcPath,
                        java.lang.String destPath)
        Description copied from interface: ProductCollection
        Inserts the referenced product or collection srcPath into the collection entry at the position immediately before the referenced product or collection destPath. To insert the referenced product/collection into last position, destPath can be null.
        Specified by:
        orderBefore in interface ProductCollection
        Parameters:
        srcPath - Referenced product/collection path/ID that needs to be moved in the order
        destPath - Referenced product/collection path/ID before which the srcPath will be placed.

      • checkItemType

        Throws an IllegalArgumentException if the type of the resource identified by its path is not supported by the implementation.
